headline: Akamai (AKAM) Jumps 11.5% After Strong Q3 and AI Cloud Launch with NVIDIA—Is Growth Accelerating?
summary: Earlier this month, Akamai Technologies announced strong third-quarter results, reporting US$1.05 billion in sales and a significant increase in net income, while also launching the Akamai Inference Cloud, an AI platform developed in partnership with NVIDIA to bring real-time edge AI capabilities closer to end users and devices. This rapid commercial adoption and technological advance into AI-powered services highlights a shift in Akamai’s business, positioning the company to address growing...
